articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Maldivian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Maldivian President
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Saturday sent a message of greeting to Abdulla Yameen Abdul Gayoom, president of the Republic of Maldives, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 The message sincerely wished the president of Maldives bigger successes in his responsible work and the Maldivian people progress and prosperity, expressing expectation that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Maldives would grow stronger.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Egyptian Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Egyptian Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the General Trade Union of Agriculture, Irrigation, Land Reclamation and Fishery of Egypt led by General Secretary Samy Mohamed Rezk Rezk which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Egyptian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Egyptian Body
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the General Trade Union of Agriculture, Irrigation, Land Reclamation and Fishery of Egypt.
					 The gift was conveyed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, by General Secretary of the union Samy Mohamed Rezk Rezk, who is heading its delegation, on Saturday.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Kicking off Reckless Military Provocations: Spokesman for KPA Panmunjom Mission
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Kicking off Reckless Military Provocations: Spokesman for KPA Panmunjom Mission
 Panmunjom, July 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in a statement on Saturday denounced the south Korean puppet warmongers for staging frantic shelling drills in the areas of Paekryong and Yonphyong Islands every day as part of desperate military provocations against the DPRK.
					 What matters is that the U.S. is behind all these military provocations, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 On July 20, too, U.S. imperialist aggressor forces brought with them loudspeakers and blared near the Military Demarcation Line in Panmunjom that the drills being staged by the puppet forces in waters southwest of the West Sea, a hot spot, are "regular ones" and they are "not related to the situation at all". They did this as a very shameless "prior notice." 
					
					 On the day of provocative shelling they brought riff-raffs of an "international visiting group" to the scene of provocation under the pretext of "confirming" the observation of the armistice agreement, fanning up hysteria of the puppet warmongers.
					
					 The U.S. is hurling the puppet forces into ceaseless arms buildup and military provocations in the above-said waters in a sinister bid to preserve the illegal "northern limit line", to begin with.
					
					 According to the conspiratorial plan to preserve the "northern limit line" in recent years, the U.S. is hurling the puppet forces and human scum into waters southwest of the West Sea including Paekryong Island to scatter leaflets, deliberately straining the situation there.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which frequently infiltrated the puppet warships and fishing boats into the territorial waters of the DPRK side under the pretext of "intercepting illegal fishing boats" and it is again the U.S. which often let manned and unmanned aircraft fly in the sky above those sensitive waters.
					
					 Lurking behind these military provocations is a foolish intention to preserve the waning justification for keeping the "UN Command." 
					
					 The U.S. should never forget even a moment that its bases of provocations are within the range of indiscriminate sighting strike of the KPA.
					
					 These reckless military provocations of the U.S. will only precipitate its doomsday.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Reckless Tongue-lashing
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Reckless Tongue-lashing
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Joint National Organization of Working People of the DPRK released a statement on Saturday denouncing south Korean Park Geun Hye's ceaseless reckless tongue-lashing against the DPRK.
					 The DPRK has seriously advised and warned Park Geun Hye of her reckless tongue-lashing, terming it a source of trouble for the nation, the statement said, adding:
					
					 However, Park has not yet come to reason but is still keen on letting loose invectives against the DPRK.
					
					 Reprimanding her once again for the wrong way of thinking she had when she was foul-tongued on July 20 as she is politically illiterate, ignorant of even common knowledge, the statement went on:
					
					 Park talked rubbish that the "biggest hurdle" lying in the way of achieving peace and stability on the Korean peninsula is the "north's nukes."
					
					 Park, however, should know what the real hurdle is.
					
					 In a nutshell, the actual stumbling block is the U.S. and her group blindly following it, not the DPRK's nukes.
					
					 She should bear in mind that peace on the Korean peninsula is harassed by the U.S. moves for aggression and war and stability there is disturbed by the confrontation and hostility being incited by her and her group of traitors moving according to her skirt swishing.
					
					 Ridiculing her claim that the DPRK is "developing nuclear weapons in disregard of the living of its citizens", pursuant to the line of developing the two fronts simultaneously, the statement urged her to be well aware of the weighty significance of the DPRK's line, to begin with.
					
					 The line is the wisest choice to foil the U.S. and its followers' desperate moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and promote wellbeing of the people and accelerate the building of a thriving nation, it noted, and went on: 
					
					 The DPRK's nukes protect its people's destiny from the constant moves of the U.S. and its stooges for aggression and nuclear war and huge funds for building of conventional force go to the improvement of the people's living standard. This is the essence of the above-said line.
					
					 The people of the DPRK enjoy all social benefits given by the state -- free education, free healthcare and provision of houses.
					
					 She is bound to feel ashamed as she would get to know that the national incomes advertised by her regime and the U.S. is no more than petty ones when they are compared with the social benefits in the DPRK.
					
					 Park was so impudent as to say that her regime would "actively support the economic development" in the DPRK by "cooperating with the international community" if it makes a strategic decision to "dismantle its nukes."
					
					 The people of the DPRK have dynamically advanced along the road of prosperity by their own efforts.
					
					 Park, seized with sycophancy toward the U.S., had better concern herself about the crippled economy of south Korea that depends on the U.S.
					
					 She claimed the "unification" pursued by her is "the ultimate solution" in an effort to mislead the public opinion by creating impression that such complicated issues as "nukes, human rights and provocation" were spawned by the DPRK. She had better drop such a pipe dream.
					
					 The issues that should be settled are neither the issue of the DPRK's nukes, a treasured sword common to the nation, nor the "human rights issue" which can never exist in its popular masses-centred society.
					
					 What should be halted urgently is the U.S. nuclear blackmail and threat against the DPRK, human rights abuses in south Korea, a human rights tundra where fascist dictatorship is rampant, and all the political and military provocations being perpetrated every day by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet military warmongers against the DPRK.
					
					 Park once again self-exposed through her reckless remarks that she is no more than a hideous confrontation maniac rare to be found in the world.     Park is doomed to ruin like her father who met a miserable death as he betrayed the nation.

articles.title: Member of European Parliament Here
articles.content:
Member of European Parliament Here
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Frank Engel, member of the European Parliament from the Christian Social People's Party of Luxembourg, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Trade Union of Agriculture, Irrigation, Land Reclamation and Fishery of Egypt, a delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan, an Okayama Prefectural delegation for Japan-Korea friendship and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday.
					 They paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the halls of immortality where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Egyptian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Egyptian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Trade Union of Agriculture, Irrigation, Land Reclamation and Fishery of Egypt led by General Secretary Samy Mohamed Rezk Rezk visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President at the old home in Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics preserved with much care.
					
					 They went round revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 They also went round the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Rungna Dolphinarium, etc.

articles.title: Preparations for 2015 ITTF World Tour Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for 2015 ITTF World Tour Brisk in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The GAC group 2015 ITTF World Tour Challenge Series-Pyongyang Open is scheduled to be held in DPRK from July 29 to August 2.
					 For the successful tournament, preparations have been pushed forward, said Ju Jong Chol, secretary of the Table-tennis Association, when interviewed by KCNA.
					
					 He said:
					
					 First of all, the Table-Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street, the venue of the tournament, has been spruced up. And the emblem for the tournament figured with a bat and ball and letters "Pyongyang 2015" was brought out.
					
					 Pyongyang Open will be held divided into male and female singles and doubles and U-21 singles with aces from Asian, European and American countries involved.
					
					 The DPRK team includes Ri Myong Sun, Ri Mi Gyong and Kim Hye Song who proved successful in the ITTF World Team Cup held in January.

articles.title: Great Feats Performed by Korean Women for War Victory
articles.content:
Great Feats Performed by Korean Women for War Victory
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean women made a great contribution to winning the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) by displaying the spirit of self-sacrifice and patriotic devotion.
					 The Korean women had performed great feats during the Fatherland Liberation War to defeat the armed invasion of the U.S. imperialists, said War veteran To Yun Ok, adding:
					
					 After the liberation of the country from Japan's colonial rule over Korea, they led a happy life as masters of the country, the masters of the factory and land for five years.
					
					 When the U.S. imperialists ignited a war against the DPRK, they did not hesitate to send their husbands, sons and daughters to the front and volunteered themselves for military services to defend their happy life.
					
					 Among them are a number of heroines like An Yong Ae, Jo Sun Ok, Thae Son Hui and Jo Ok Hui who devoted their life to the sacred war for defending the country.
					
					 In the period of the war, the Korean women in the rear turned out as one in the wartime production under the slogan "The rear is, as it were, the front!" assisting the Korean People's Army materially and morally.
					
					 They were convinced that the victory was in store for them as they were led by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Though 62 years have passed after the war, the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the country displayed by them in the period of war is creditably carried forward by the coming generations.

articles.title: Great Loss U.S. Imperialists Suffered from Korean War
articles.content:
Great Loss U.S. Imperialists Suffered from Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- 62 years have passed after the Korean people won a great victory in the three year-long Fatherland Liberation War by defeating the armed invasion of the U.S. imperialists.
					 July 27, Juche 42 (1953) was the day of victory for the Korean people but the one of bitter defeat for the U.S.
					
					 After signing the Armistice Agreement at Panmunjom, Clark, the then commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East and commander of the UN Forces, confessed that he felt fiasco like his predecessors MacArthur and Ridgway.
					
					 A U.S. congressman also said that the U.S. had suffered a great loss in Korea.
					
					 When the U.S., always boasting of its "invincibleness", invaded the young DPRK, nobody thought that the latter would emerge victorious.
					
					 During the Korean war, the U.S. imperialists mobilized over two millions of troops, one fifth of its air force and most of its Pacific Fleet armed with latest combat equipment and spent more than 73 million tons of war supplies.
					
					 But the army and people of the DPRK repelled the armed invasion of the U.S. imperialists and won the great victory in the war under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 The US News and World Report said that the loss of the U.S. army in the Korean war at least doubled all the losses it suffered from the past five big wars.
					
					 Marshal, former U.S. Secretary of State, and a Western newspaper said that the myth of the U.S. was shattered.
					
					 Now the U.S. is desperately keen on its moves to provoke a new war, oblivious of its defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 But the DPRK will always emerge victorious as long as it has the invincible revolutionary army guided by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Biochemical Warfare against Koreans
articles.content:
U.S. Biochemical Warfare against Koreans 
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. introduction of anthrax germs is causing a big stir in south Korea. This case makes the Korean people remind of the biochemical warfare committed by U.S. during the Korean war (June 25, 1950- July 27, 1953).
					 In the wartime, the U.S. imperialist invaders had massacred innocent civilians by using germs and chemical weapons. 
					
					 In the period from February 1951 to July 1953, the U.S. targeted 24 cities and counties in the northern half of Korea as well as the front area for its chemical warfare and used chemical weapons on a large scale.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists reduced POWs into guinea-pigs for experiments of poisonous substances to death.
					
					 It can be well evidenced by the fact that in 1952, the U.S. experimented chemical weapons on POWs in different camps, including Koje Island to slaughter and deform them.
					
					 The atrocity committed by the U.S. imperialists through biochemical warfare during the Korean war had been brought to light by those articles, reports, information bulletins, appeals and letters of protest the fact-finding groups of the Women's International Democratic Federation (WIDF), the International Association of Democratic Lawyers (IADL) and progressive scientists of the world released after touring damaged areas in 1951 and 1952.
					
					 At that time, a member of the WIDF fact-finding group criticized that the hideous crime committed by the U.S. imperialists in Korea would make even the Nazis blush with shame.
					
					 After the ceasefire in Korea, the U.S. has remained persistent in its moves to stifle the DPRK. But the U.S. ambition to stifle the DPRK and thus occupy the whole Korea is no more than a daydream.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never forget the crime-woven history of the U.S. brutes but force them to pay dear price for their crimes at any cost.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Its Nonsensical Talk about "Threat" from DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Its Nonsensical Talk about "Threat" from DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- At a hearing of the U.S. Senate Armed Services Committee held on July 9 the informally designated chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff asserted that the DPRK, Russia and other countries are "principal foes" of the U.S. and the world and the DPRK's development of nukes and missiles pose direct threat to south Korea and Japan.
					 On July 1 Martin Dempsey, chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff, in a report on the 2015 national military strategy claimed that the DPRK, Russia and China are "trying to change the major phase of the international order and moving to threaten the national security of the U.S."
					
					 The nuclear and ballistic missile capabilities of the DPRK will not only pose direct threat to south Korea and Japan but threaten even the U.S. mainland some day, Dempsey added.
					
					 Their remarks only reflected Washington's sinister design to contain the major powers in Asia-Pacific by pushing ahead with its pivot-to-Asia-Pacific strategy, noisily trumpeting about its bankrupt story about "threat from north Korea."
					
					 Washington has remained unchanged in its wild ambition to carry out its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 Washington is stepping up its work for laying a military and strategic siege to Russia and China under the pretext of coping with the "military threat" and "provocation" from the DPRK, pursuant to its policy for containing them.
					
					 An expert on U.S. defense and diplomatic matters asserted that the U.S. "strategy for rebalancing power in Asia-Pacific" is generally aimed to keep its rule over the region.
					
					 Washington works hard to ward off the ever-increasing military influence of Russia and China over the region and meet its interests in the Asia-Pacific by force of arms.
					
					 To this end, it expanded the sphere of the cooperation between the U.S. forces and the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" to cover the whole world through the re-amendment to the "U.S.-Japan defense cooperation guidelines" and is getting zealous in its moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is building the biggest-ever military bases in Asia-Pacific since the end of World War II as part of its scenario for carrying out its Asia-Pacific policy.
					
					 The U.S. scenario is to keep the highest readiness in the region regardless of budget. It keeps 60 percent of its naval forces in the region and at least 300 warships or 60 percent of the warships in the Pacific and additionally deployed 4 submarines on Guam.
					
					 The U.S. is reportedly to respectively dispatch a nuclear-powered submarine and a destroyer to Guam and Japan and deploy various war hardware including long-range drones on Guam till 2017.
					
					 Nonsensical is the U.S. claim that the arms buildup is to cope with the "threat" from the DPRK. It only brings to light Washington's failure in its anachronistic strategy.
					
					 The present international order is in the process of multi-polarization while the U.S. hegemonic position is declining.
					
					 Countries in Asia-Pacific including big powers are countering with a tough stand the U.S. moves to beef up its forces in the region, regarding them as a red line in the sphere of strategic security.
					
					 Gone are the days when a specified country could control world politics.
					
					 The U.S. had better drop its ambition for hegemony as it is against the on-going trend of the times when all countries and nations are achieving development with equal rights.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Progressive and Democratic Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Suppressing Progressive and Democratic Forces
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Recently the progressive and democratic forces are being mercilessly suppressed in south Korea.
					 A warrant of arrest was issued for the chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions who opposed the misrule of the puppet regime and urged it ensure the people's right to existence. The police stormed and searched the office of the April 16 Solidarity which has taken the lead in the struggle for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster. At least 30 people related to the Teachers Union were indicted by the prosecution.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 This suppression has started since Hwang Kyo An, a ferocious fascist, took office as "prime minister." 
					
					 It was puppet chief executive Park Geun Hye who appointed Hwang as puppet prime minister as she knows well about his outrageous and cruel character as a fascist gangster.
					
					 By manipulating him behind the scene, Park seeks to totally stamp out the progressive and democratic forces, tide over her ruling crisis and lay a foundation for long-term power of the "Saenuri Party."
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the terror-ridden atmosphere created in south Korea is an inevitable product of Park's dictatorial and tyrannical rule.
					
					 The south Korean regime should immediately stop its brutal suppression of progressive and democratic forces, bearing in mind that it is bound to meet stern punishment by history and the nation only for its fascist and repressive rule.

articles.title: Papers Call for Struggling in Heroic Fighting Spirit Displayed by Victors in Great Years
articles.content:
Papers Call for Struggling in Heroic Fighting Spirit Displayed by Victors in Great Years
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Papers Saturday editorially call upon all the service personnel and people to live and struggle in the heroic fighting spirit displayed by the defenders of the country in the 1950s, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un, and thus eternally glorify the proud and ever-victorious history and tradition of Songun Korea. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The loud shout of the slogan "For the party and the leader!" heard on the front and in the rear during the days of the war reflects the core of the heroic fighting spirit displayed by the people of the generation for winning the victory in the war.
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War was a revolutionary war in which the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses was achieved for the first time in the history of the revolutionary struggle of the working class and the revolutionary outlook on the leader, the outlook on the country, intense loyalty and shining distinguished feats in battles were combined to be integral faith.
					
					 Let's devotedly protect Kim Jong Un who represents the destiny and future of Korea and symbolizes steady victories. This is the ardent request of war veterans and will of all service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The noble lives dedicated by the veterans to defending the country and the devoted efforts made by them for the prosperity of the country serve as a textbook in the life and struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the socialist cause in the DPRK will always triumph as long as there are the war veterans who remain loyal to Kim Jong Un and dependable successors to the Korean revolution who steadfastly carry forward the lineage of Juche true to the intention of the revolutionary forerunners.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Denounce Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Denounce Authorities' Fascist Suppression of Progressive Forces 
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the April 16 Solidarity, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and other bodies of different social standings  in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 23 in denunciation of the authorities' fascist suppression. 
					 Speakers said the suppression of the progressive forces by the police, prosecution and the Intelligence Service has gone beyond a tolerance limit since Hwang Kyo An was appointed as "prime minister." 
					
					 They indiscriminately suppress the progressives by detaining, indicting, storming and searching their houses, taking issue with their peaceful meeting, the speakers said. 
					
					 They called upon all the organizations to firmly unite and launch a struggle to put an end to the fascist suppression.

articles.title: Thorough Investigation into U.S. Experiment of Anthrax Germ Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Thorough Investigation into U.S. Experiment of Anthrax Germ Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean People's Investigation Group into Anthrax Germ held a press conference on July 21 urging the regime to make investigation into the U.S. forces' experiment of anthrax germ at the Ryongsan U.S. military base as soon as possible, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 The organization referred to the fact that there is a biochemical warfare laboratory in the 121st evacuation hospital under the 65th medical brigade of the U.S. military base in Ryongsan, Seoul.
					
					 It held that various germ warfare experiments including anthrax germ were made in U.S. military bases in Osan, Ryongsan, Phyongthaek and Kunsan, according to the "Jupiter plan", a biochemical warfare scenario.
					
					 This being a stark fact, the Seoul City authorities made no protest against the U.S. forces side and did not clarify any plan for investigation, the organization noted.
					
					 It called for making a positive investigation into the experiment of the anthrax germ in Ryongsan U.S. military base.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Discloses Irregularities and Corruption of Park Geun Hye's Clan
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Discloses Irregularities and Corruption of Park Geun Hye's Clan
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Segye Ilbo on July 17 disclosed the irregularities and corruption of the puppet chief executive's clan.
					 According to it, the husband of Park Geun Hye's cousin by a maternal aunt robbed a woman, driven into a corner due to her illegal act, of a large sum of money.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for Victory in War Praised in Guinea, Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for Victory in War Praised in Guinea, Malaysia
Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Guinea and a film show in Malaysia on July 18 and 20 on the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Displayed at the venue of the seminar were photos documenting the Songun leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Participants of the film show watched a Korean film dealing with the exploits performed by the President in leading the war to victory. 
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea said in a report that the U.S. provoked the Korean war to realize its wild ambition for world domination on June 25, 1950. He went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK dealt merciless blows at the aggressors under the wise leadership of the President.
					
					 The U.S. bent its knees before the army and people of the DPRK on July 27, 1953.
					
					 This great victory was a miracle wrought thanks to the gifted strategies and tactics, unique war methods and outstanding commanding art of the President.
					
					 His war exploits will shine forever.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea in their speeches highly praised the President for shattering the U.S. imperialists' myth of "mightiness" and Kim Jong Il for leading the confrontation with the U.S. to victory.
					
					 They said Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the struggle of the Korean people to defend the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and reunify the country.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries from July 16 to 18 ahead of the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War and on the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 A meeting was held in Russia, a seminar in Britain, a lecture in Guinea and a film show in Myanmar.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the lecture were photos dealing with the feats President Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory.
					
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean film "Arms of Korea."
					
					 The chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia said in a speech that the President was an invincible and iron-willed commander and gifted strategist who led the Fatherland Liberation War to shining victory.
					
					 The chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK in his report noted that July 27 marks the 62nd anniversary of the historic victory won by the Korean army and people in the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists under the guidance of the President.
					
					 Always finding himself among service personnel and people, the President instilled conviction in victory into them and prevailed over the numerical and technical advantages of the enemy with his original strategies, tactics and war methods, he stressed, adding:
					
					 The exploits the President performed for the victory in the war will shine forever.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in Britain.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Observe Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Observe Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
 Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- July 27, 1953 is the significant day in human history.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on July 18 ahead of the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The heroic and peace-loving Korean army and people won a victory in the Fatherland Liberation war under the outstanding leadership of President Kim Il Sung, matchless brilliant commander possessed of iron will and rare wisdom.
					
					 The U.S. suffered a bitter defeat for the first time in history and was compelled to sign the armistice agreement.
					
					 The victory achieved by the Korean people won the admiration of all people.
					
					 It also encouraged the peoples of many countries struggling for national independence.
					
					 The President, who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation, was boundlessly revered by the world people as the great leader of the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un the DPRK has turned into an invincible socialist bulwark, impregnable fortress which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 July 27, the day of glorious victory, powerfully encourages the Korean people to the struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom advierte a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom advierte a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- El vocero de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 25 una declaracion condenando a los belicistas titeres surcoreanos que en estos dias se recurren con mas frenesi a la provocacion militar efectuando con frecuencia los imprudentes entrenamientos de canonazo en los alrededores de los islotes Paekryong y Yonphyong.
					El problema reside en que detras de esas provocaciones esta Estados Unidos, senala el vocero y continua:
					
					El dia 20, los uniformados de tropas agresoras norteamericanas se aparecieron con altavoz en la Linea de Demarcacion Militar de Phanmunjom y actuaron descaradamente haciendo un "aviso previo" de que los ejercicios de sus titeres surcoreanos en las zonas mas candentes de aguas maritimas de Sudoeste son "habituales" y que "no tienen nada que ver con las situaciones".
					
					El mismo dia en que se realizo el canonazo, introdujeron al lugar de disparo hasta las chusmas del "grupo de visita internacional" bajo el pretexto de "comprobar" la observacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio estimulando asi la furia provocativa de los belicistas titeres.
					
					El imperio yanqui perpetra sin cesar el aumento de las fuerzas armadas y las provocaciones militares enviando los titeres surcoreanos a las zonas mas candentes arriba citadas, lo cual persigue su malsana intencion de mantener la ilicita "linea de limite al Norte". 
					
					Segun el plan conspirativo de mantener dicha "linea", EE.UU. manda en los ultimos anos a los compinches titeres y las escorias humanas a lanzar volantes en las aguas maritimas del Sudoeste incluyendo el islote Paekryong agravando asi intencionalmente la situacion de esa zona.
					
					Estados Unidos es el autor que hace infiltrar los buques y barcos pesqueros surcoreanos en aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC bajo el pretexto de la "inspeccion de barcos pesqueros ilegales" y envia con frecuencia los aviones con pilotos y sin pilotos en el espacio aereo de las zonas maritimas mas candentes.
					
					Estas maniobras de EE.UU. tienen objetivo de mantener a toda costa el pretexto de la existencia de la comandancia de las "fuerzas de la ONU" que se va a desaparecer.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener en cuenta siempre de que sus bases provocativas se han puesto al alcance del disparo indiscriminado de punteria directa del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. recurre a las insensatas maniobras militares en las zonas cadentes del mar por medio de los titeres surcoreanos, tanto mas anticipara su destino de la ruina.

articles.title: Portavoz de CNOM refuta disparate anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Portavoz de CNOM refuta disparate anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Conjunto Nacional de Organizaciones de Masas hizo publica este sabado una declaracion que senala:
					 La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ha criticado duramente y aconsejado en varias ocasiones a la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye preocupandose de su boca que sirve de desgracias y rompecabezas de la nacion.
					
					Pero, ella sigue lanzando las injurias sin recobrar todavia su conocimiento.
					
					Por eso, queremos volver a cuestionar severamente el erroneo pensamiento de Park, tonta en lo politico e idiota inimaginable, con respecto a sus disparates del dia 20.
					
					Park debe saber correctamente cual es el obstaculo verdadero de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana antes de cacarear que las "armas nucleares del Norte (de Corea)" constituyen el obstaculo mas grande. 
					
					En una palabra, ese obstaculo no es el artefacto nuclear de la RPDC, sino EE.UU. y los compinches de Park que le obedecen a ciegas.
					
					Park debe conocer bien que en la Peninsula Coreana la paz esta violada por la agresion y la guerra de EE.UU. y la estabilidad se impide por la confrontacion y la hostilidad de ella misma y la horda de traidores que se porta segun sus ordenes.
					
					Ella censuro que la RPDC recurre a la linea de desarrollo paralelo "fabricando las armas nucleares al dar espaldas a la vida de los habitantes". Pero, ella debe tener presente la gran significacion de esa linea.
					
					Nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo constituye la opcion mas sabia para frustrar las perversas maniobras de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras tendentes a aislarnos y aplastarnos y para lograr el fomento de bienestar de los habitantes de la RPDC y la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Defender con las armas nucleares el destino de los habitantes desde las incesantes maquinaciones de agresion y guerra nuclear del imperio y sus lacayos e invertir a la mejora de vida del pueblo los fabulosos fondos que se gastan para la construccion de fuerzas armadas convencionales, esto es precisamente la esencia de la original linea de desarrollo paralelo sin precedente de este mundo.
					
					En la RPDC el Estado ofrece todos los beneficios sociales al pueblo inclusive la ensenanza y la asistencia medica gratuitas y las viviendas.
					
					Si saca cuenta todos los beneficios sociales que reciben los norcoreanos, Park puede saber que eso se llega a la cantidad  muy grande en comparacion con la renta nacional per capita de que hablan tanto el Sur de Corea y EE.UU. y sentira verguenza por si misma. 
					
					Park dijo atrevidamente que "si el Norte de Corea toma la decision estrategica de renunciar las armas nucleares, le brindaria la ayuda economica en colaboracion con la sociedad internacional". 
					
					Ella debe dejar de actuar con absurdidad. 
					
					El pueblo coreano vino logrando la prosperidad por su propia cuenta.
					
					Park, acostumbrada al servilismo proyanqui, ha de preocuparse de la economia surcoreana delicada que puede mantenerse solo con el amparo de EE.UU. 
					
					Ella induce en error la opinion publica como si "el problema nuclear, el de derechos humanos, la provocacion" y otros problemas complicados fueran engendrados por alguien y maldijo que la "unificacion" que persigue ella misma es el "remedio final". Pero, esto es la vana ilusion de sonambula. 
					
					Lo que debe ser resuelto no es las armas nucleares de la RPDC que sirven de remedio todopoderoso comun de la nacion ni el "problema de derechos humanos" inexistente en la sociedad norcoreana. Lo que debe ser acabado cuanto antes es el chantaje y amenaza nucleares anti-RPDC de EE.UU., la situacion de derechos humanos de la sociedad surcoreana donde predomina la dictadura fascista, y las provocaciones politicas y militares de toda indole de EE.UU. y los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano. 
					
					Esta vez Park Geun-hye revelo otra vez su aspecto de maniaca de enfrentamiento. 
					
					La unica opcion para ella es sepultarse como su padre que sufrio el fin tragico por haber traicionado a la nacion.

articles.title: Se impulsan preparativos para Competencia Abierta de Ping Pong de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Se impulsan preparativos para Competencia Abierta de Ping Pong de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 25 de julio (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar del 29 de julio al 2 de agosto en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la competencia abierta de ping pong de Pyongyang en el marco del Giro Mundial de la ITTF 2015.
					Segun Ju Jong Chol, secretario de la asociacion de tenis de mesa de Corea, se promueven en etapa final los preparativos para la exitosa efectuacion de la competencia.
					
					Se ataviaron con peculiaridad el interior y el exterior del Centro de Ping Pong de la avenida de Chongchun, sede de la competencia. Y se instalaron por completo los equipos para asegurar los torneos.
					
					Se dio a luz el emblema en que estan reflejadas la raqueta y la pelota de tenis de mesa y se ve la inscripcion "Pyongyang 2015".
					
					Tomaran parte en la presente cita los sobresalientes jugadores provenientes de varios paises de Asia, Europa y America. Se realizaran alli juegos individual y colectivo de adulto de ambos sexos y el torneo individual de ambos sexos sub-21.
					
					En visperas de la competencia, los jugadores coreanos incluyendo Ri Myong Sun, Ri Mi Gyong y Kim Hye Song, quienes sobresalieron en ITTF World Team Cup que tuvo lugar en enero de este ano, dan mas acicate a los entrenamientos.
